entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snow level rising to 1100 metres near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries changing to flurries near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
